about.heading: About
about.paragraph: DEI Turncoats celebrate all corporate turncoats who reversed their values overnight and scrapped their DEI (Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion) programs.

aboutPage.heading: Tämä ei ole takkikauppa
aboutPage.subtitle: Tämä on kannanotto yhdenvertaisuuden puolesta
aboutPage.headline: Lyhyesti
aboutPage.paragraph:
Aikana, jona globaalit brändit peruvat DEI-ohjelmiaan, me kannustamme suomalaisia yrityksiä ja ihmisiä puolustamaan yhdenvertaisuutta. Näissä asioissa emme voi kääntää takkiamme: DEI ei todellakaan ole out. 

 Väestöliitto puolustaa yhdenvertaisuutta Suomessa ja maailmalla. Voit auttaa yksityisenä henkilönä tai yrityksenä lahjoittamalla naisten ja tyttöjen, vammaisten henkilöiden ja sateenkaari-ihmisten yhdenvertaisuutta ja seksuaalioikeuksia puolustavaan työhömme kehittyvissä maissa. 

 Tukesi turvin yhä useampi voi elää ja toteuttaa unelmiaan juuri sellaisena kuin on.

 Yrityksille: jos haluatte yrityksenä olla vahvemmin mukana puolustamassa yhdenvertaisuutta, tarjoamme myös laajempia mahdollisuuksia yhteistyölle (ks. yhteystiedot)
aboutPage.signature:
Kiitämme huomiosta ja tuesta tälle tärkeälle asialle. Väestöliitto 

 *Yhteystiedot*: [lahjoitukset@vaestoliitto.fi](mailto:lahjoitukset@vaestoliitto.fi) *Väestöliiton rahankeräyslupa*: RA/2020/1558

items.cardDescription: This jacket used to represent belonging and the power of diversity to drive better outcomes for business and community. Not anymore.
items.title: The Return Coat
items.subtitle: Diversity sent back to warehouse
items.deiInImageAlt: 'DEI IN' Bomber jacket black turncoat shot in studio.
items.deiOutImageAlt: 'DEI OUT' Bomber jacket black turncoat shot in studio.
items.deiInHeadline: What this coat used to stand for
items.deiInSubtitle: What this coat used to stand for
items.deiInDescription: This jacket used to offer experiences of belonging and diverse people creating better outcomes for business and community. Not anymore though.
items.deiOutHeadline: What this coat used to stand for
items.deiOutSubtitle: What this coat used to stand for
items.deiOutDescription: This jacket used to offer experiences of belonging and diverse people creating better outcomes for business and community. Not anymore though.

items.cardDescription: This blue bomber jacket captures how quickly you can flip your fit on DEI.
items.title: Magical Shift Jacket
items.subtitle: Our coat used to embrace inclusive storytelling, inspire dialogue and ensure we spoke to everyone. But that’s over now.
items.deiInImageAlt: 'DEI IN' Bomber jacket blue turncoat shot in studio.
items.deiOutImageAlt: 'DEI OUT' Bomber jacket blue turncoat shot in studio.

items.cardDescription: This white bomber jacket shifts like the values it’s missing — DEI in, DEI out.
items.title: Values-Not-Found Jacket
items.subtitle: This white bomber jacket shifts like the values it’s missing — DEI in, DEI out.
items.deiInImageAlt: 'DEI IN' Bomber jacket white turncoat shot in studio.
items.deiOutImageAlt: 'DEI OUT' Bomber jacket white turncoat shot in studio.
items.deiInHeadline: What our coat used to stand for
items.deiInSubtitle: What our coat used to stand for
items.deiInDescription: This jacket used to stand for racial equality and building a workforce that reflects the community it served. You can forget that now.
items.deiOutHeadline: What our coat used to stand for
items.deiOutSubtitle: What our coat used to stand for
items.deiOutDescription: This jacket used to stand for racial equality and building a workforce that reflects the community it served. You can forget that now.

legal.headline: Legal disclaimer
legal.paragraph:
This campaign is a work of social commentary. No real clothing is sold through this website.

The visual elements and phrases featured in this campaign are intentionally styled to resemble common branding aesthetics for the purpose of critique. They do not use actual trademarks or logos, nor are they affiliated with any commercial entities.

Our aim is to spotlight a troubling global trend: the quiet retreat from DEI (Diversity, Equity & Inclusion) values in workplaces. The campaign is run by a non-profit organization and constitutes non-commercial, public interest expression.

Any resemblance to brands is symbolic. If that resemblance feels uncomfortable, we invite reflection on why.
